explains: adj. 部长的，公使的，内阁的；牧师的
wordGroup: ministerial meeting n. 部长级会议

sentences.en: The prime minister's initial ministerial appointments haven't pleased all his supporters.
sentences.cn: 这位首相最初的部长任命没有令他所有的支持者都满意。

sentences.en: That is why we have come to China as the strongest ministerial delegation ever to visit from the UK.
sentences.cn: 那就是我们作为英国有史以来最强大的部长级代表团到中国访问的原因。

sentences.en: Repeated Ministerial advice is carrying little weight and the expansion programme is not working very well.
sentences.cn: 部长们一再提出的建议收效甚微，扩张计划也不太奏效。
